Package drawit.shapegroups2

Class LeafShapeGroup

java.lang.Object
drawit.shapegroups2.ShapeGroup
drawit.shapegroups2.LeafShapeGroup
public class LeafShapeGroup
extends ShapeGroup

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    LeafShapeGroup​(RoundedPolygon shape)
    Initializes this object to represent a leaf shape group that directly contains the given shape.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<RoundedPolygon> getAllShapes()
    Returns the list of the RoundedPolygon objects contained directly or indirectly by this shape group, in depth-first order.
    Extent getBoundingBox()  
    String getDrawingCommands()
    Returns a textual representation of a sequence of drawing commands for drawing the shapes contained directly or indirectly by this shape group.
    RoundedPolygon getShape()
    Returns the shape directly contained by this shape group, or null if this is a non-leaf shape group.

    Methods inherited from class drawit.shapegroups2.ShapeGroup

    bringToFront, getAncestors, getParentGroup, scale, sendToBack, translate

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • LeafShapeGroup

      public LeafShapeGroup​(RoundedPolygon shape)
      Initializes this object to represent a leaf shape group that directly contains the given shape.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if shape is null 
      shape == null
      IllegalArgumentException - if shape has less than three vertices 
      shape.getVertices().length < 3
      Mutates:
      this
      Postconditions:
      getShape() == shape
      getParentGroup() == null

  • Method Details

    • getShape

      public RoundedPolygon getShape()
      Returns the shape directly contained by this shape group, or null if this is a non-leaf shape group.
      Immutable
      Any two calls of this method on the same target object return equal values.

    • getAllShapes

      public List<RoundedPolygon> getAllShapes()
      Description copied from class: ShapeGroup
      Returns the list of the RoundedPolygon objects contained directly or indirectly by this shape group, in depth-first order.
      Specified by:

      Specified by:

    • getDrawingCommands

      public String getDrawingCommands()
      Description copied from class: ShapeGroup
      Returns a textual representation of a sequence of drawing commands for drawing the shapes contained directly or indirectly by this shape group. For the syntax of the drawing commands, see RoundedPolygon.getDrawingCommands().
      Specified by:
      getDrawingCommands in class ShapeGroup
